title: Update Menu content and UI to match uploaded menu screenshots

requirements.summary: Replace hardcoded menu content with a transcription-based menu model sourced strictly from the 12 uploaded screenshots, including variant pricing and Veg/Non-Veg indicators.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/menu.ts no longer contains the existing placeholder categories like "Italian Specialties", "Sandwiches & Salads", or invented items/descriptions.
All menu categories/items/prices shown on the website are transcribed from (and match) the user-uploaded screenshots, with no additional items, no modified names, and no inferred prices.
Where the screenshots show variant pricing (e.g., Half/Full; Medium/Large with inch sizes), the data model captures those variants so the UI can render them clearly.
Where the screenshots indicate Veg/Non-Veg, the data model captures that indicator (e.g., a tag/flag) so the UI can display it in text/icon form.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing placeholder menuData with a new menu structure transcribed strictly from the 12 uploaded screenshots; update types to support (a) items with a single price or a set of labeled variant prices (e.g., Half/Full, Medium/Large with inch sizes) and (b) Veg/Non-Veg markers as explicit fields usable by the UI. Ensure no invented categories/items/descriptions/prices remain.

requirements.summary: Update MenuSection to render the new screenshot-derived menu structure in the existing accordion layout, including variant pricing and Veg/Non-Veg indicators, and replace Italian-only marketing copy with generic menu text.
acceptanceCriteria: MenuSection renders each category from the new menu data and displays items with either a single price or a clear variant price layout when multiple prices apply.
MenuSection no longer displays Italian-only marketing copy; update the section description text to a generic menu description that matches the broader menu shown in the screenshots.
Veg/Non-Veg markers are displayed consistently for items where the screenshots indicate them.
The Menu section remains functional and responsive (accordion expands/collapses; layout does not overflow on mobile).

file_operations.description: Refactor rendering to match the updated menu data model from frontend/src/content/menu.ts while keeping the current Accordion-based layout; add UI for (1) single-price items and (2) multi-variant price display with clear labels/columns, and render Veg/Non-Veg markers consistently (text/icon). Replace the Italian-focused description with a generic English menu description. If using any shadcn-ui components (e.g., dialog/badge/separator), compose existing components without editing frontend/src/components/ui/* and verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add the 12 uploaded menu screenshots as static public assets and provide an optional in-page viewer (modal/gallery) to view the original images from within the Menu section.
acceptanceCriteria: All 12 screenshots are available as static files under the frontend public assets (no backend involvement) and referenced by their exact filenames.
MenuSection includes an optional UI control that allows viewing the original screenshots in a readable way (modal/lightbox or dedicated gallery area).
No stock images are introduced and no menu images are fetched from third-party sources.
